description: This schema describes version 20210228 of the metadata standard for the amulet poem format, designed for the Zora protocol.
title: Amulet20210228

carbonOffsetURL.description: An HTTPS link to a record of the carbon offset purchased in this poem's name.

description.description: The description of the amulet. You can feel free to have fun & be evocative with this; including a link to the current formal definition is probably wise, but not required.
examples: This is an amulet, a short poem with a lucky SHA-256 hash, explained here: https://text.bargains/ This poem's rarity is COMMON.

mimeType.description: The mimeType of the amulet. This will always be text/plain.

poemText.description: The text of the amulet. Although this is required, the text at the contentURI in the Zora NFT is considered the canonical version.

rarity.description: The rarity level of the amulet.

version.description: The calendar version of the schema.

examples.description: This is an amulet, a short poem with a lucky SHA-256 hash, explained here: https://text.bargains/ This poem's rarity is COMMON.
examples.name: morning amulet
